name: Hi-Score Boi
description:
There is always that one goal of every gamer...that goal is to become the ULTIMATE gamer! It's time to pick up the controller, glue yourself to the couch and get ready!

In this clicking simulation game, you play as Hi-Score Boi as he games throughout the night to become the ULTIMATE gamer. Jam to awesome music as you help Hi-Score Boi achieve the highest score!

Key Features


  • Rock out to amazing music!
  • Enjoy a unique display of colors with each tap!
  • Unlock 50 unique achievements!
